<denchmark-h:h4>Description</denchmark-h>
print_matrix and print_normalized_matrix methods have predict labels bug in some case <denchmark-h:h4>Steps/Code to Reproduce</denchmark-h>
>>> d = [0,1,0,0,1,0,1,0] >>> s = [0,1,0,0,1,0,1,0] >>> cm = ConfusionMatrix(d,s) >>> cm.relabel(mapping={0: "Normal", 1: "Abnormal"}) >>> cm.print_matrix() <denchmark-h:h4>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Predict Abnormal Normal Actual Abnormal 3 0
Normal 0 5
</denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h4>Actual Behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Predict Normal Abnormal Actual Abnormal 3 0
Normal 0 5
</denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h4>Operating System</denchmark-h>
Windows 10 <denchmark-h:h4>Python Version</denchmark-h>
